epic.title: Usability & Accessibility
epic.summary: Comprehensive usability and accessibility framework ensuring intuitive user experience, WCAG compliance, and internationalization support to make healthcare technology accessible to all users.
epic.businessOverview: Comprehensive usability and accessibility framework ensuring intuitive user experience, WCAG compliance, and internationalization support to make healthcare technology accessible to all users. The system is designed with mobile-first responsive design, full keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and multi-language capabilities to ensure healthcare technology is usable by diverse user populations including those with disabilities and non-English speakers.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- Responsive design framework
- Accessibility testing tools
- Internationalization (i18n) library
- Screen reader testing infrastructure
- Keyboard navigation handlers
- Multi-language content management
- RTL (Right-to-Left) layout support
- Color contrast validation tools
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Month 1:**
- Responsive design and mobile-first implementation

**Month 2:**
- Accessibility features and WCAG compliance

**Month 3:**
- Internationalization and multi-language support

**Month 4:**
- User testing and accessibility validation

**Ongoing:**
- Continuous UX improvements and accessibility audits
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Community Health Network**

- **Challenge:** Low user adoption, accessibility barriers, language limitations
- **Outcome:** 40% increase in user adoption, WCAG 2.1 AA certified, 5 languages supported

stories.title: Mobile-first responsive design
stories.description: Implement mobile-first responsive design to ensure optimal user experience across all device sizes, prioritizing mobile devices while maintaining desktop functionality.

stories.title: Support for iOS Safari, Android Chrome, desktop browsers (latest 2 versions)
stories.description: Ensure compatibility with iOS Safari, Android Chrome, and latest 2 versions of desktop browsers to support users across all major platforms and devices.

stories.title: Maximum 3 clicks to reach key functions
stories.description: Design navigation so that key functions are accessible within maximum 3 clicks to provide intuitive user experience and reduce user frustration.

stories.title: Contextual help and tooltips
stories.description: Provide contextual help and tooltips throughout the application to guide users and reduce the need for external documentation or training.

stories.title: Onboarding wizard for new users
stories.description: Implement onboarding wizard for new users to introduce key features and help users get started quickly with the system.

stories.title: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
stories.description: Ensure full WCAG 2.1 AA compliance to make the application accessible to users with disabilities and meet legal accessibility requirements.

stories.title: Keyboard navigation support
stories.description: Provide full keyboard navigation support allowing users to access all functionality without requiring a mouse, supporting users with motor disabilities.

stories.title: Screen reader compatibility (JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver)
stories.description: Ensure compatibility with major screen readers including JAWS, NVDA, and VoiceOver to support users with visual impairments.

stories.title: Color contrast ratios meeting accessibility standards
stories.description: Maintain color contrast ratios that meet WCAG accessibility standards to ensure text is readable for users with color vision deficiencies.

stories.title: Alternative text for images and icons
stories.description: Provide descriptive alternative text for all images and icons to enable screen reader users to understand visual content and navigate the interface.

stories.title: Multi-language support (English, Spanish, Hindi, etc.)
stories.description: Support multiple languages including English, Spanish, Hindi, and others to serve diverse patient populations and improve accessibility for non-English speakers.

stories.title: Locale-specific date/time/number formatting
stories.description: Implement locale-specific formatting for dates, times, and numbers to match regional conventions and improve user experience for international users.

stories.title: Currency conversion and display
stories.description: Support currency conversion and display in multiple currencies to accommodate international patients and billing requirements.

stories.title: Right-to-left (RTL) language support
stories.description: Provide right-to-left (RTL) language support for languages like Arabic and Hebrew to ensure proper text display and navigation for RTL language users.
